titles.title: Environmental Education Act of 1993

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Environmental Education Act of 1993 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Education to make grants, through a national competition, to establish and support a National Environmental Education Center.
